suggestions.name: Tuna Avocado Wrap
suggestions.description: A quick and protein-packed wrap with tuna and creamy avocado.
instructions: Drain the canned tuna and place in a bowl
Mash the avocado half and mix with tuna
Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper to the mixture
Lay out the tortilla and add spinach leaves
Spread the tuna-avocado mixture on top
Slice cherry tomatoes and add on top
Roll up the tortilla tightly and cut in half if desired

suggestions.name: Quinoa Veggie Bowl
suggestions.description: A nutritious bowl with quinoa, fresh vegetables, and chickpeas.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions (typically 15 minutes)
While quinoa cooks, dice bell pepper and cucumber
Slice cherry tomatoes in half
Drain and rinse chickpeas
In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, chickpeas, and all vegetables
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine

suggestions.name: Egg and Vegetable Scramble
suggestions.description: A quick and satisfying protein-rich scramble with eggs and vegetables.
instructions: Dice bell pepper and slice cherry tomatoes in half
Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat
Add bell pepper and cook for 2 minutes until slightly softened
Add spinach and cherry tomatoes, cook for another minute
Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper
Pour eggs over vegetables in the pan
Gently stir until eggs are cooked through but still soft, about 3-4 minutes
Serve immediately
